body:
In the x/sys repo, it's probably better in the long run to switch to a Go
based generation infrastructure so that we can have tests that make sure
the generation program works on the builder (and ideally also check that
the z*.go files match the result generated on the builder.) Perhaps we can
reuse cmd/cgo for this.

But before we can do that, we need to figure out how to handle changes in
different versions of the same OS.
